body: Once per day, a rogue with this talent can roll two dice while making a Sleight of Hand check and take the better result. She must choose to use this talent before making the Sleight of Hand check. A rogue can use this ability one additional time per day for every 5 rogue levels she possesses.
name: Fast Fingers
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Rogue/Rogue Talents/Fast Fingers
